articles.description: All the latest Champions League highlights and reaction as Man City's slump in form continues at Juventus and Arsenal ease to victory over Monaco.
articles.title: Watch every Champions League goal plus reaction as Arsenal win and Man City lose

articles.description: With one win in 10 games in all competitions and facing a real battle to progress in the Champions League, Manchester City have been described as 'under real pressure' to turn their form around.
articles.title: Champions League: 'Never seen a Guardiola team this bad' - Man City under 'real pressure'

articles.description: Legendary American football coach Bill Belichick returns to the game after a year out but not as a coach in the NFL.
articles.title: Bill Belichick: New England Patriots legend becomes University of North Carolina coach

articles.description: Baseball star Juan Soto signs the biggest contract in the sport's history, agreeing a $765m (£600m) deal over 15 years with the New York Mets.
articles.title: Juan Soto joins New York Mets on £600m ($765m) contract - biggest deal in history of sport

articles.description: Bukayo Saka is enjoying a superb season with Arsenal and proves his worth again with an inspirational display in their Champions League win over Monaco.
articles.title: Bukayo Saka: 'He is an incredible person' - Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta lauds forward

articles.description: Second-half substitute Ferran Torres scores twice to help Barcelona move up to second in the Champions League table.
articles.title: Borussia Dortmund 2-3 Barcelona: Ferran Torres double seals Barca points

articles.description: The men's football World Cup will take place in Saudi Arabia in 2034 with the promise of "one of a kind" stadiums and organisers insisting everyone is welcome - but what will it look like?
articles.title: World Cup 2034: What will a Saudi tournament look like?

articles.description: When you talk of transfer market mistakes made by Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola in recent times, Julian Alvarez is one who springs to mind.
articles.title: Julian Alvarez: Atletico Madrid striker's fine form has left Manchester City regretting sale

articles.description: George Ford insists that his appetite for international rugby is keener than ever despite dropping behind Marcus Smith in coach Steve Borthwick's pecking order.
articles.title: George Ford: England fly-half keen for Test return

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou is in stormy waters at Tottenham. But might a return to Glasgow in the Europa League restore some calm?
articles.title: Rangers v Tottenham: Can Postecoglou rediscover old comforts in Glasgow?
